meanings.definition: Soft and yielding to the touch.
meanings.sent1: The pillow felt squshy when I squeezed it.
meanings.sent2: The marshmallow was so squshy, it melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: I tried to sit on the squshy beanbag chair, but it swallowed me whole!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt squshy with love for her new puppy.
meanings.sent5: The squshy clouds floated lazily across the sky.

meanings.sent1: The squshy balloon popped as soon as I touched it.
meanings.sent2: The squshy playdough could be molded into any shape.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a squshy sponge after a long day at the water park.
meanings.sent4: His ego was so squshy, any criticism would deflate it instantly.
meanings.sent5: The squshy rubber band stretched until it snapped.
